title: 1911 Helmar Stamps T332 - Ty Cobb - SGC Authentic
author: pencil1974

posts.post_title: 1911 Helmar Stamps T332 - Ty Cobb - SGC Authentic
posts.post_content:
I may have posted this in the wrong section before so I will post here as well.

Getting this back from SGC on Monday and just gauging interest in it. Only 6 have been graded total by SGC or PSA.

Contact me if you are interested. 

Here is a photo before it was authenticated, white border was trimmed down but a great hard to find piece.
